## Generated Files

### Video (MP4)
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -s name \
  -m title="Where has this year gone?" \
  -m artist="Irregular Galaxy Doods" \
  -m date="2025-12-24" \
  -m comment="this year really got away from me ðŸ˜–" \
  -o thisyear.mp4 \
  *.png
```

**Output:** [thisyear.mp4](thisyear.mp4) - 82KB, 12 seconds

### Animated GIF
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -f gif -s name \
  -o thisyear.gif \
  *.png
```

**Output:** [thisyear.gif](thisyear.gif) - 387KB, 12 seconds

*Note: GIF format does not support embedded metadata.*

## Configuration

- **Sorting:** Alphabetically by filename
- **Duration:** 3s per frame (default)
- **Total Duration:** 12 seconds
- **Format:** 576x720 (adaptive to largest image)
